'''Kamui Shuriken''' is a technique utilised by Kakashi Hatake through his Susanoo.

== Usage ==
After manifesting the [[Complete Body — Susanoo]], Kakashi is able to create several, large projectiles shaped like [[Obito Uchiha]]'s [[Mangekyō Sharingan]] which he imbues with [[Kamui]]. The shuriken are then launched by Susanoo — rapidly spinning towards the intended target before cutting and instantly warping them into [[Kamui's dimension]] on contact.

== Trivia ==
* In ''[[Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 4]]'', Kakashi is also able to throw miniature versions of these shuriken without manifesting his Susanoo.
